featured.text: The underlined word conduct in the first paragraph is closest in meaning to (A) behave.
The underlined word ulcer in the second paragraph refers to a particular kind of (A) mental illness.

definition.zh_def: 在文字下方加上線條以強調或區分。
definition.en_def: Marked with a line underneath to emphasize or distinguish.
definition.example: The important terms were underlined in the document.
